Detailed Description

wxSkinWindow is the abstract base class for all skinned controls in wxSkin

wxSkinWindow manages the skin files for all controls in wxSkin. In addition to that it handles the most basic events, like painting and sizing a control. Drawing the "over" state is also done here.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void wxSkinWindow::DrawCustom ( wxDC &  dc  )  [pure virtual]

Overwrite this method in derived classses.

This method will be called after the standard drawing action has been completed. This allows to do some non-standard drawing in dervied controls.

Implemented in wxSkinButton, wxSkinCheckBox, wxSkinGauge, wxSkinPanel, wxSkinRadiobutton, and wxSkinSlider.

void wxSkinWindow::SetState2Skin ( const wxImage &  skin = wxNullImage  ) 

Set the "second state" skin.

What this skin image actually contains is up to the control derived from wxSkinWindow. For a button for example this is the skin in "pressed" state.
